mav_sim.message_types.msg_sim_params module¶

msg_sim_params.py defines the parameters needed for simulation

class mav_sim.message_types.msg_sim_params.MsgSimParams(ts_simulation: float = 0.01, start_time: float = 0.0, end_time: float = 100.0, ts_plotting: float = 0.1, ts_control: float | None = None)¶
